question: Which one is NOT the receptor for innate recognition?
explanation: TNF-α receptor 屬於細胞介素受體，不具有先天免疫辨識的功能。 [出自考古第1題]

question: What kind of disease can probably be controlled by vaccine?
explanation: [出自考古第2題]

question: Which one is NOT the event during inflammation?
explanation: 發炎時，血管直徑應為「增加」。 [出自考古第3題]

question: Thymic cortical epithelial cells mediate positive selection of developing thymocytes. Which cells will mature in the thymus of mouse? MHC class I-negative mutant mice.

options.C: Both CD4 and CD8 T cells.
options.D: Neither CD4 nor CD8 T cells.

explanation: 此突變小鼠細胞不表現 MHCI，僅表現 MHC II，所以在 Positive selection 的過程中只有可辨識 (self)peptide:self MHC class II complexes 的 Double-positive thymocytes 可以存活，並發育為CD4 T cells。 [出自考古第4題]

question: Thymic cortical epithelial cells mediate positive selection of developing thymocytes. Which cells will mature in the thymus of mouse? MHC class I-negative mutant mice with MHC class I transgene expressed in thymic epithelium.

options.C: Both CD4 and CD8 T cells.
options.D: Neither CD4 nor CD8 T cells.

explanation: 雖此突變小鼠細胞原本不表現 MHC class I，但 Thymic epithelium 有 MHC class I 的 Transgene(透過基因工程手段移至生物體內的外源性基因)表現，故 Thymic cortical epithelial cell 依然可以表現 MHC class I 以進行 Positive selection。再加上 MHC class II 基因依然正常表現，因此 CD4 和 CD8 T cell 都會成熟。 [出自考古第5題]

question: Thymic cortical epithelial cells mediate positive selection of developing thymocytes. Which cells will mature in the thymus of mouse? MHC class I-negative mutant mice with MHC class I transgene expressed that cannot interact with CD8.

options.C: Both CD4 and CD8 T cells.
options.D: Neither CD4 nor CD8 T cells.

explanation: 若要使 CD8 T cell 發育，則 MHC class I 必須和 CD8 分子有效的作用 (interact)。雖然 Thymic cortical epithelial cell 可以表現 MHC class I，但無法作用的情形下亦無法使 CD8 T cell 發育。 [出自考古第6題]

question: Which one of the following tumors is involved in? Multiple myeloma.
explanation: 多發性骨髓瘤(multiple myeloma)為漿細胞(plasma cell)增生的惡性疾病，屬於B細胞腫瘤。 [出自考古第7題]

question: Which one of the following tumors is involved in? Chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL).
explanation: 一般所說的 CLL 為 B cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia (B-CLL),也有T cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia,成因為周圍淋巴器官的T細胞和B細胞異常增生。 [出自考古第8題]

question: Which one of the following tumors is involved in? Thymoma.
explanation: 胸腺瘤(thymoma)為胸腺基質/上皮細胞的異常增生，這兩種細胞雖與 T細胞發育有關，但不屬於T細胞，故不屬於T或B細胞腫瘤。 [出自考古第9題]

question: Which one of the following defects impairs? Adenosine deaminase.

options.C: Both B and T cell development.
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development.

explanation: Adenosine deaminase (ADA)可以移除 DNA 降解時所產生的 Deoxyadenosine。ADA Deficiency 會造成 dATP 累積,將抑制核糖核酸還原酶的活性,進而阻礙 DNA 合成,對於淋巴細胞有高度毒性。因此,缺乏 ADA 會影響T細胞和B細胞的發育。 [出自考古第10題]

question: Which one of the following defects impairs? IFN-γ deficiency.

options.C: Both B and T cell development.
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development.

explanation: IFN-γ 理論上只會影響 B細胞分泌的抗體類型,而不會影響 B細胞發育; IFN-γ 主要是影響 $T_{H}1$ 的分化和功能,而不影響T細胞發育,因為T細胞發育和分化是不一樣的。 [出自考古第11題]

question: Which one of the following defects impairs? RAG deficiency.

options.C: Both B and T cell development.
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development.

explanation: RAG-1和RAG-2 主要負責T細胞及B細胞的基因重組,故缺乏 RAG 會影響兩者的發育。 [出自考古第12題]

question: Which one of the following is the property or example of (A) TD antigen (B) TI-1 antigen (C) TI-2 antigen (D) None? Polyclonal B-cell activation.
explanation: TI-1 antigen 在高濃度下會刺激形成 Polyclonol activation。 [出自考古第13題]

question: Which one of the following is the property or example of (A) TD antigen (B) TI-1 antigen (C) TI-2 antigen (D) None? Requires repeating epitopes.
explanation: TI-2 antigen 這類抗原的特色是有重複的片段,如 Polysaccharide capsule (莢膜類細菌的多醣),而B細胞(B-1 細胞或是 Marginal zone B cell)可以辨識並產生 IgM,如果樹突細胞介入,其會分泌 BAFF 使 B 細胞進行 Class switch 產生 IgG。 [出自考古第14題]

question: Which one of the following is the property or example of (A) TD antigen (B) TI-1 antigen (C) TI-2 antigen (D) None? Diphtheria toxin.
explanation: 白喉毒素(diphetheria toxin)為TD,見下圖舉例。 [出自考古第15題]

question: Which one of the following functions is mainly mediated by human immunoglobulin? Sensitization of mast cells.
explanation: Mast cells 利用 FcεRI receptor 與 IgE結合,致敏化後可以進行後續的過敏反應(allergy; type I hypersensitivity) [出自考古第16題]

question: Which one of the following functions is mainly mediated by human immunoglobulin? Sensitization for killing by NK cells.
explanation: NK cell 利用 FcyRIII receptor(CD16)和IgG 結合,可以啟動 ADCC (antibody- dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity)反應殺掉細胞。 [出自考古第17題]

question: Which one of the following functions is mainly mediated by human immunoglobulin? Neutralization in the gut lumen.
explanation: 雖然 IgM、IgG 和 IgA 皆有中和作用,但上皮組織屬於 Mucosal immune system,在腸道主要由 IgA-switched plasma cell 分泌 Dimeric IgA,並藉由 Polymeric Ig receptor(pIgR)將 Lamina propria 的 Plasma cells 分泌的 IgA 從上皮細胞的 Basolateral face 轉運到 Apical face 並釋放到 Gut lumen 中 (腸道腔內本身不會有常駐的淋巴球，抗體是由上皮細胞基底膜後方穿過上皮細胞送到腸道腔中)。 [出自考古第18題]

question: Which of the following is associated with the development of such $T_{reg}$ cells in these patients?
explanation: [出自考古第19題]

question: Which of the following molecules is recently found to be associated with severe drug hypersensitivity reaction, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, to anti-seizure drug carbamazepine?
explanation: HLA-B 會抓住 CBZ(carbamazepine)呈現給 T細胞,促使T細胞活化而引起史蒂文生強生症候群(Stevens-Johnson syndrome),屬於 Type IV hypersensitivity。 [出自考古第20題]
